nodes.text: The OX9 was a model of labor droid used by the Trade Federation. It was essentially humanoid in shape, short, stocky, with large plate-like hand appendages to facilitate carrying large loads. They were also capable of constructing various buildings. They had elongated heads, were the same beige color as B1-Series battle droids, and spoke in warbling droidspeak. OX9 droids were produced at command centers.
The OX9 first appeared in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and in its 2002 expansion pack, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns. They cost 50 units of food.
Hear an OX9 (Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds)
